statements: DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 10 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Furniture Ltd' AND sustainability_score < 4.5;
DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND sustainability_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Water Usage' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM GreenCertifications WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
